AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: big horned
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s horns show that [PAWN_pronoun] belongs to the strongest of the beasts. Larger horns are carried with pride; proof that [PAWN_pronoun] is blessed with strength and stands above the lesser kin.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: raider
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] lives for violence, even more so than most minotaur. The only thing that brins joy to [PAWN_objective] is the bloodshed of humanity.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: grunt
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is average rough and vile minotaur. [PAWN_pronoun] isn't very smart, but is good to have around when there's a fight at hand.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: wildling
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a massive minotaur to a human family. [PAWN_possessive] mother did not survive the birth. [PAWN_pronoun] was left in the wilds like so many other mutant children by a distraught father, and was rescued by a nearby gor herd that heard the mutant child calling. [PAWN_pronoun] has always been held in high regard by the herd, as somehow the story of [PAWN_possessive] birth is known by them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: herd born
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born as a minotaur to minotaur parents. The only life [PAWN_pronoun] has ever known has been in the herd. Violence and mayhem have always been with [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: strange bullgor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born a mutant to human parents. Abandoned like so many other mutant babes, [PAWN_pronoun] was left to die or fend for [PAWN_objective]self in the wild. [PAWN_nameDef] was stranger than the rest of the mutant children, having a mind touched by chaos throwing [PAWN_objective] into a mania from time to time.
